its cool and fun pls dont kill me

Uma obra-prima moderna, a Mona Lisa do mundo dos jogos, a experiêcia que esse jogo lhe proporciona é o tipo de experiência que te faz compreender o que é ser gamer. Gráficos ótimos, mesmo sendo um jogo antigo, jogabilidade muito boa, a ideia do jogo é simplesmente esplêndida e inédita. E depois que você terminar o modo campanha, delicie-se à vontade no Multiplayer, que por acaso possui um sistema de comunicação eficiente com seu amigo, jogar esse jogo com amigos é simplesmente muito divertido. O antecessor desse jogo inefável, Portal, é uma ótima introdução para esse mundo, você não precisa jogar Portal para jogar Portal 2, mas é melhor jogar.
E claro que merece um destaque a antagonista, GLaDOS, uma vilã para se apaixonar, não é uma vilã comum, é o tipo de vilã que faz você colar um poster dela no seu quarto, mesmo sendo uma máquina, a mente, a psicologia da GLaDOS junto com seu humor sarcástico, torna ela perfeita. 
Mas lembre-se: o bolo é uma mentira.

One of the best games ever made!

Sequels are usually expected to live up to their originals. This is for all forms of entertainment; books, movies, and of course, video games. A lot of the time, sequels fall into two spectrums:

The first is being weaker than its predecessor, which can happen when elements are degraded to a simplier level, or the overall experience doesn't feel so much like something new; it feels like you're playing the same game again. Many sequels can fall into this category for being too much like its original, or downgrading from that point.

The second is the one that is to strive for: expanding upon story and mechanics and making the game feel the same but also different. New mechanics and properties that make you think differently than the one before it, that also gives the feeling of nostalgia and excitement from the original. This is what makes sequels great.

Portal 2 falls under the second category, which can be hard to pull off in such a fantastic way that VALVe did. 

To really get a feel for this game, play the original. The story's initial concepts are applied and expanded upon further to such heights unexpected. Not only that, but there are various new mechanics besides "place your portal here, then here, then you're done." Such concepts are illustrated farther into the game with some of the most creative puzzles that really make you think.

The voice acting in this game is also spectacular, which is hard to say for a lot of games. For example, one character often messes up what he says, and stutters often saying words like "um"; though this may not sound particularly exciting, it fleshes out a character more and makes them more like the people around us (and ourselves), as we as people trip over words sometimes. Such things are hardly portrayed in video games, and even such small details as that are to be appreciated about Portal 2.

With the voice acting comes iconic lines that many players know, and sarcastic responses and comebacks around every corner. It made me chuckle at least a few times, because each character is enjoyable through the script. 

Also, I would highly recommend co-op, but only after you play a bit of single player so you get a hold of the mechanics. The co-op courses are really fun to play and satisfying to solve with your friend. But we all know that one person is doing all the work while the other follows directions. There's even a joke about this in-game. Quite lovely.

In conclusion...Portal 2 was and continues to be an amazing experience. The story is more in-depth than that of the first game, so it takes a little longer to complete. This is not a problem, however, due to the fantastic puzzles, realistic characters, and entertaining writing. 

This is truly one of the most wonderful games out on the market, and I would recommend this to anyone who played the first game.

İyi yönler:
*Senaryo hiç fena değil ve kesinlikle tahmin edilebilir değil, bol bol bizi kandırıyor oyun.
*Ufak tefek bi iki mekanik eklenmiş (çeşitlilik iyidir).
*Karakterler birbirinden iyi yazılmış. Sizi oyuna bağlıyorlar.
*Co-op oynanış bi harika, (atölye desteğide cabası)
*  Credits :)

Kötü yönler 
*Bulmacalar bana çok basit geldi.
*Yeni bikaç mekanik daha eklense hiç fena olmazdı
*Bulmacalar çok sıradan ve neredeyse birbirinin aynısı (son birkaç bulmaca hariç onlar güzel bence)

因为第一部太惊艳，立刻玩了第二作，结果没有失望
解密难度提升了一些，第七章的某些关卡甚至卡关了。
第二部的场景比起前作来丰富了很多
其实可以把前作当成是教学，第二部才是本番的感觉
推荐先玩前作，会对剧情感触更深。
通关后还解锁了补完剧情的小漫画，很开心~

去年促销十几块钱买了portal1和2的合集包（今年就只要几块钱了[捂脸]），现在都通关了来评价一下。
第二部比第一部要完善很多，尤其是剧情方面，感觉还是很不错。可能是玩过1了，所以玩2的时候觉得没有1难，1好像有更多考验规定时间内完成的关卡。2比1多了凝胶系统、激光和那个传输的光束，游戏性更好了。2还有双人联机，听说很不错，不过我还没有找到小伙伴一起玩，继续期待吧。觉得买2就够了，1没啥剧情，游戏方式2还更多一些。
游戏性方面，关卡不算太难，一般多看几下很快就能找到方法，个别地方可能会卡住，纠结很久。游戏里的提示其实都还是挺明显的，一般四周看一圈就能知道咋办。这种偏益智性质但不算很难的游戏玩起来还是比较有成就感的，另外人在空中快速下落的动作多了真的有点刺激。
反正这么便宜的价格（前几天夏季特卖好像只要6块？），买个Portal2肯定不会亏，强烈推荐。
